pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Oil Formula Lime Body Wash Revitalising 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Coconut Oil Formula Revitalising Body Wash with Lime Extract contains pure Coconut Oil and Lime Extract, to hydrate and revitalise your skin.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of eye contact, rinse immediately with water.

Common Uses

Paraben, Sulfate and Phthalate Free. Contains plant derived ingredients.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Glycol Stearate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Fruit Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cocamide MEA, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, PEG-150 Distearate, Ethanolamine, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Hydroxide, Acrylates Crosspolymer-4, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Glycol, Sorbic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Coumarin, Limonene.

Directions

For best results, apply a small amount onto a cleansing pouf or washcloth, gently massage onto the body in the shower, and then rinse. To help keep skin moisturised throughout the day, follow with your favourite Palmer's body lotion.
